tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: **** **** ****** *** very good behaviour. During the whole pregnancy period of my wife she guided us like a senior family member and till end time provided her support. Whenever we called her over phone she picked up and replied. Over whatsapp also she responded to our all queries. Whatever we can say in her appreciation will be very less. Just speechless in her treatment and overall very nice. At a scale of 10 will provide 10. Would also recommend others to visit her and whatever issue you have just ask the doctor she will show you the correct path. At the end very thanks Mam for you support you provided us. In coming future would like to visit you again.
reply_text: Thank you for having faith in your physician. God bless you all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My pregnancy was very complicated at 30 weeks and there was risk for both of us. I contacted Dr. Anindita over the phone and she was very responsive. She attended me with priority and helped me getting admission to the hospital during Covid situation. Today my baby boy is 5.5 months old and all because of Anindita mam whose timely advise, suggestions and prompt treatment saved both of our life.I am thankful to Mam for her diligent line of treatment.-Paushali

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Always approachable, always seen with a warm smile. Friendly Careful and leaves no stone unturned if there is slightest possibility of any kind of problem. Doesn't make you linger for test outcomes. She will text you back with all the necessary informations and actions that needs to be taken. She is brilliant and I am very happy that I came to know about her from a friend of mine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I love my doctor,  she helped me to fulfill my wish of being mother. 
With past history of a miscarriage and then on a regular fight with type 2 diabetes, her expertise and    guidance helped me to sail the journey successfully. Blessed with a baby girl. 
I wish her more success ahead.

tags: None
review:
Very rude behavior with me, *** ***** ***** ******** *** wasted money. She suggested me to do all tests, after test reports came then she is unable to help me, behave just very rudely.
When first time consult with her, she told me to send reports to whatsapp but when i sent all reports to her then she spoken very arrogant and disconnect call.
Please dont consult with her. Please guys save money and time. She is very arrogant, if patient is in emergency she is unable to help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Anindita mam saved me and our newborn baby from all bad situations.I had low laying placenta, spotting during 1st trimester to begining of 3rd trimester.obstetric cholestasis was identified.along with decreasing HB value.Madam always give me right guidence right medicine in right time.She adviced to do test which is actually needed to identify the issues.I feel comfortable to talk to share my problems.She is very responsible to her patients and responded back to me whenever I faced any health issues.My journey of becoming a mother from a woman is being possible and became easier only because of Anindita madam.Before OT and after OT there are many risks but hopefully we both baby and mother are saved without any issues.In my  journey of pregnancy , the guidance of Anindita mam is unforgettable.Many many thanks to Madam.
reply_text: Thank you for remembering me.god bless you all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very friendly, humble and  pays attention to your concerns very patiently but the only problem I face at the time of visit is the crowd and that also during this pandemic situation, what I noticed that one patient is accompanied by two male members so, the staffs working there should ask male members to wait outside and only to come inside at the time of doctor call or in case of any requirement...This will not only help in maintaining social distancing during the current pandemic situation  but also provide proper space to sit for pregnant ladies...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: She is  communicable, friendly and very supportive. patient can depend on with full trust or confidence.

tags: None
review: Dr. Anindita is one of the best doctors I have ever met. She is so calm and patient, she has her very own way of getting the patient comfortable letting her to speak her heart out. The treatment has been doing well for me.

review: First of all I must say she is  very nice person, after long time I find a doctor who used to explain every thing to the patient. Thank you very much doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is a very nice human being...first..she understands the actual concern...i first visited her for my child birth since then she  is my most trusted dr..her attitude behaviour everything is so good ..she assist the patient with all queries and worries.and makes treatment so comfortable...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: First of all I would say that she is very good human being. She listened very patiently and explained everything very well.If you ask anything on watsapp, madam answers that problem.I am currently undergoing her treatment and got very good result.I pray to God that she stays healthy and the way she is benefitting everyone, she can do it for the rest of her life.I would recommend her. Thank you Madam once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor paid a very patient ear to my problems and the medicines she prescribed was also not very costly. Moreover she explained the process of my recovery in a step by step process, in addition to which she even shared her phone number so that in case of any difficulties I may immediately get in touch with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: - Ma'am fee is not 300 , it's 500- There is no parking space for 4 wheeler ,park at your own risk .- Receptionist are not friendly they used rought language.- They don't have card machine please carry cash .- They don't have Xerox machine , please keep copy of your voter , Aadhar card .- Ma'am is good and friendly , I recommend her but not the clinic.
